title.rendered: 3 Pieces Fleece Ponytail Headband Earband Winter Running Headband Ear Warmer

content.rendered:
About this item

  • Soft fabric: made of fabric material, soft and lightweight, comfortable to wear and fluff well-proportioned, not easy to fade and easy to wash, can last for a long time use
  • Practical design: convenient to use with the headband hole, you can slip your hair through the hole to fix your ponytail, make your activities more comfortable and flexible
  • Wide usages: fit for long hair and non-ponytail wearers, can also keep you warm in cold weather, suitable for many occasions, such as running, jogging, bicycling, climbing, fishing and so on
  • Stretchy size: the contoured shape provides full ear protection, the hole (for ponytail) size is approx. 4.5 cm/ 1.8 inches, the width over the ear is approx. 11.5 cm/ 4.5 inches, stretchy material ensures it fit for most peoples’ head size
  • Package includes: 3 pieces of ponytail headbands in various colors for you to choose, easy for you to match with different kinds of outfits
